p: AMOS version 21.0 was first used to conduct confirmatory factor analysis (CFA). Five latent constructs were contained within the measurement model ( Figure 1). As shown in Table 3, the revised model exhibited an appropriate fit after CFA (Ï‡ 2/df = 2.174, goodness-of-fit index = 0.908, root mean square error of approximation = 0.069, comparative fit index = 0.932, normalized fit index = 0.946, adjusted goodness-of-fit index = 0.873).
